The story follows two young people named Princess Asuka and Prince Hanako as they embark on an adventure to find a legendary treasure called "The Holy Grail". In the end, Princess Asuka and Prince Hanako successfully find The Holy Grail and together with other fairies, unicorns, and mystical creatures in the magical world, celebrate and joyfully welcome the legendary treasure "The Holy Grail" back to its rightful home and realm - the magical world of the fairies, unicorns, and mystical creatures!

1. "Divergent" (2011) - A dystopian novel set in a future where all humans have been divided into five factions based on virtues: Amity, Candor, Courage, Prudence. The main character, Tris Prior, discovers that she is Divergent, the human who does not belong to one of the factions. She must then learn how to control her abilities and keep them hidden from everyone else. The story also explores themes such as love, betrayal, friendship, courage, self-discovery, destiny, free will, reality vs perception, the power of choice, the consequences of our choices, the importance of relationships, the role of fate in our lives, the concept of "meant to be" and how it relates to our lives.

In this film, we see Edward and Bella's daughter, Renesmee Cullen. She lives with her mother in Forks, Oregon.
